Defining URL:http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/ValueSet/valueset-coverage-type
Name:VhDir Coverage Type
Definition:

This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the type of coverage of a plan.

Publisher:HL7 - TBD
Source ResourceXML / JSON / Turtle

This value set is not used

VhDir Coverage Type

This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the type of coverage of a plan.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-payercharacteristics
    CodeDisplay
    medicalMedicalType of insurance plan that covers medical services.
    dentalDentalType of insurance plan that covers dental services.
    mentHlthMental HealthMental health insurance coverage.
    substanceabuseSubstance AbuseType of insurance plan that covers substance abuse services.
    visionVisionType of insurance plan that covers vision services.
    drugDrugType of insurance plan that covers prescription drugs.
    stcShort Term CareType of insurance plan that covers short term care.
    ltcLong Term CareType of insurance plan that covers long term care.
    hospiceHospiceType of insurance plan that covers hospice services.
    homehealthHome HealthType of insurance plan that covers home health services.
    dmeposDMEPOSDurable Medical Equipment, Prosthetics/Orthotics and Supplies.
    imagingadvAdvanced Imaging (CT/PET Scans, MRIs)Advances imaging techniques services (CT/PET Scans, MRIs) coverage.
    prevPreventive Care/Screening/ImmunizationPreventive Care/Screening/Immunization.
    rehabRehabilitationRehabilitation.

Expansion

This value set contains 14 concepts
